publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2464.1 Michael Russell: Anti-Terrorism Measures and the European Convention on Human Rights—As an amendment to motion (S1M-2464) in the name of Robert Brown, insert at end "and further notes that, despite all these overwhelming arguments, the Liberal Democrat MSPs did not oppose the Sewel motion."

S1M-2464.1 Michael Russell: Anti-Terrorism Measures and the European Convention on Human Rights—As an amendment to motion (S1M-2464) in the name of Robert Brown, insert at end "and further notes that, despite all these overwhelming arguments, the Liberal Democrat MSPs did not oppose the Sewel motion."
S1M-2464.1 Anti-Terrorism Measures and the European Convention on Human Rights (lodged on 21 November 2001) Andrew Wilson*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2464.1 Anti-Terrorism Measures and the European Convention on Human Rights (lodged on 21 November 2001) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2464.1 Anti-Terrorism Measures and the European Convention on Human Rights (lodged on 21 November 2001) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-2464.1 Anti-Terrorism Measures and the European Convention on Human Rights (lodged on 21 November 2001) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2464.1 Anti-Terrorism Measures and the European Convention on Human Rights (lodged on 21 November 2001) Brian Adam*
S1M-2464.1 Anti-Terrorism Measures and the European Convention on Human Rights (lodged on 21 November 2001) Irene McGugan*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-2464.1 Anti-Terrorism Measures and the European Convention on Human Rights (lodged on 21 November 2001) Shona Robison*
S1M-2464.1 Anti-Terrorism Measures and the European Convention on Human Rights (lodged on 21 November 2001) Linda Fabiani*
